summary: TL* TAKATA RECALL. THE CONTACT OWNS A 2013 MERCEDES-BENZ C250.  THE CONTACT RECEIVED NOTIFICATION OF NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 18V043000 (AIR BAGS); HOWEVER, THE PARTS TO DO THE RECALL REPAIR WERE NOT AVAILABLE. THE DEALER (MERCEDES-BENZ OF FAIRFIELD, 2950 AUTO MALL PKWY, FAIRFIELD, CA 94533, 707-430-0101) WAS CONTACTED AND CONFIRMED THAT THE PARTS WERE NOT AVAILABLE FOR THE RECALL REPAIR. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT CONTACTED. THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE. VIN TOOL CONFIRMS PARTS NOT AVAILABLE.  *TT  CONSUMER STATED REPAIR  NEW 2 FRONT RECALL DONE 8/8/2018 TIRES INSTALLED 9/14/18. UPDATED 10/22/18*JB
